author: vargasa
body:
#### PR description:

No major changes. Addresses @cvuosalo review [comment](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/26386#discussion_r274108871) and some code cosmetics.

#### PR validation:

```
cmsRun Geometry/MTDGeometryBuilder/test/python/testMTDGeometry.py
cmsShow -c simGeo.fwc cmsDD4HepGeom.root --tgeo-name=MTD
```

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

No backport
title: DD4Hep: DDTrackerRingAlgo remove double definition and spacing
